named-query.name: File.isOrphan
named-query.query: SELECT CASE WHEN (COUNT(f) > 0) THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END FROM File f WHERE f.physicalFile.id = :physicalFileId

named-query.name: File.findByHash
named-query.query: SELECT f FROM PhysicalFile f WHERE f.contentHash = :hash

named-query.name: File.findDuplicateUid
named-query.query: SELECT CASE WHEN (COUNT(f) > 0) THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END FROM File f WHERE f.uid = :uid

named-query.name: User.findCredential
named-query.query: SELECT c FROM LaieCredential c LEFT JOIN FETCH c.user WHERE c.user.email = :email

named-query.name: User.findDuplicateEmail
named-query.query: SELECT CASE WHEN (COUNT(u) > 0) THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END FROM User u WHERE u.email = :email

named-query.name: User.findDuplicateIdNumber
named-query.query: SELECT CASE WHEN (COUNT(u) > 0) THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END FROM User u WHERE u.idNumber = :idNumber

named-query.name: User.findDuplicateUid
named-query.query: SELECT CASE WHEN (COUNT(u) > 0) THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END FROM User u WHERE u.uid = :uid

named-query.name: User.findUserByUid
named-query.query: SELECT u FROM User u WHERE u.uid = :uid

named-query.name: User.findUserByEmail
named-query.query: SELECT u FROM User u WHERE u.email = :email

named-query.name: User.findUsersByManagerUid
named-query.query: SELECT u FROM UserClosure uc JOIN uc.descendant u WHERE uc.antecessor.id = :managerUid AND uc.pathLength > 0

named-query.name: User.isSubordinateUser
named-query.query: SELECT CASE WHEN (COUNT(u) > 0) THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END FROM UserClosure uc JOIN uc.descendant u WHERE uc.antecessor.id = :managerId AND u.id= :subordinateId

named-query.name: UserClosure.findAntecessorsById
named-query.query: SELECT uc FROM UserClosure uc WHERE uc.antecessor.id = :id
